GE07mbh_16_u:0: 16,000.000*0001_01 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam 16,000.000*0001_02 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_16_u:1: 16,001.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 16,001.001a ṣaṭtriṃśe tv atha saṃprāpte varṣe kauravanandanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:3: 16,001.002a vavur vātāḥ sanirghātā rūkṣāḥ śarkaravarṣiṇaḥ 16,001.002c apasavyāni śakunā maṇḍalāni pracakrire
GE07mbh_16_u:5: 16,001.003c ulkāś cāṅgāravarṣiṇyaḥ prapetur gaganād bhuvi 16,001.004a ādityo rajasā rājan
GE07mbh_16_u:6: 16,001.004c viraśmir udaye nityaṃ kabandhaiḥ samadṛśyata 16,001.005a pariveṣāś ca dṛśyante dāruṇāḥ candrasūryayoḥ 16,001.005c trivarṇāḥ śyāmarūkṣāntās tathā bhasmāruṇaprabhāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:7: 16,001.006a ete cānye ca bahava utpātā bhayaśaṃsinaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:9: 16,001.006d*0002_01 dṛśyante jagato nāthe divam āroḍhum icchati
GE07mbh_16_u:10: 16,001.006d*0003_01 yasya prasādād dharmo 'yaṃ kṛte yadvat kalāv api
GE07mbh_16_u:11: 16,001.006d*0003_02 pāṇḍavās tu mahābhāgā yuktās tu yaśasānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:12: 16,001.007a kasya cit tv atha kālasya kururājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:13: 16,001.007c śuśrāva vṛṣṇicakrasya mausale kadanaṃ kṛtam 16,001.008a vimuktaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca śrutvā rāmaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:14: 16,001.008c samānīyābravīd bhrātṝn kiṃ kariṣyāma ity uta
GE07mbh_16_u:16: 16,001.009c vṛṣṇīn vinaṣṭāṃs te śrutvā vyathitāḥ pāṇḍavābhavan
GE07mbh_16_u:18: 16,001.010c vīrā na śraddadhus tasya vināśaṃ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:21: 16,002.001 janamejaya uvāca 16,002.001a kathaṃ vinaṣṭā bhagavann andhakā vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_16_u:22: 16,002.001c paśyato vāsudevasya bhojāś caiva mahārathāḥ 16,002.001d*0004_01 etad bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi saṃmānyābhipraṇamya ca 16,002.002 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 16,002.002a ṣaṭtriṃśe 'tha tato varṣe vṛṣṇīnām anayo mahān 16,002.002c anyonyaṃ musalais te tu nijaghnuḥ kālacoditāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:23: 16,002.003 janamejaya uvāca 16,002.003a kenānuśaptās te vīrāḥ kṣayaṃ vṛṣṇyandhakā yayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:24: 16,002.003c bhojāś ca dvijavarya tvaṃ vistareṇa vadasva me
GE07mbh_16_u:25: 16,002.004 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 16,002.004a viśvāmitraṃ ca kaṇvaṃ ca nāradaṃ ca tapodhanam
GE07mbh_16_u:27: 16,002.005a te vai sāmbaṃ puraskṛtya bhūṣayitvā striyaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_16_u:29: 16,002.006a iyaṃ strī putrakāmasya babhror amitatejasaḥ 16,002.006c ṛṣayaḥ sādhu jānīta kim iyaṃ janayiṣyati
GE07mbh_16_u:30: 16,002.007a ity uktās te tadā rājan vipralambhapradharṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:31: 16,002.007c pratyabruvaṃs tān munayo yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa
GE07mbh_16_u:34: 16,002.009a yena yūyaṃ sudurvṛttā nṛśaṃsā jātamanyavaḥ 16,002.009c ucchettāraḥ kulaṃ kṛtsnam ṛte rāmajanārdanau 16,002.010a samudraṃ yāsyati śrīmāṃs tyaktvā dehaṃ halāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:35: 16,002.010c jarā kṛṣṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvi bhetsyati
GE07mbh_16_u:36: 16,002.011a ity abruvanta te rājan pralabdhās tair durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:38: 16,002.012a tathoktvā munayas te tu tataḥ keśavam abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:39: 16,002.013a athābravīt tadā vṛṣṇīñ śrutvaivaṃ madhusūdanaḥ 16,002.013c antajño matimāṃs tasya bhavitavyaṃ tatheti tān
GE07mbh_16_u:40: 16,002.014a evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaḥ praviveśa punar gṛhān
GE07mbh_16_u:41: 16,002.014c kṛtāntam anyathā naicchat kartuṃ sa jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:42: 16,002.015a śvobhūte 'tha tataḥ sāmbo musalaṃ tad asūta vai
GE07mbh_16_u:43: 16,002.015b*0005_01 yena vṛṣṇyandhakakule puruṣā bhasmasāt kṛtāḥ 16,002.015c vṛṣṇyandhakavināśāya kiṃkarapratimaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_16_u:44: 16,002.016a prasūtaṃ śāpajaṃ ghoraṃ tac ca rājñe nyavedayan
GE07mbh_16_u:45: 16,002.016c viṣaṇṇarūpas tad rājā sūkṣmaṃ cūrṇam akārayat
GE07mbh_16_u:46: 16,002.017a prākṣipan sāgare tac ca puruṣā rājaśāsanāt
GE07mbh_16_u:47: 16,002.017b*0006_01 tac cūrṇaṃ sāgare cāpi prākṣipan puruṣā nṛpa
GE07mbh_16_u:48: 16,002.017b*0007_01 jajñe sāve[va?]rakāś cūrṇaṃ prakḷptaṃ tair mahodadhau
GE07mbh_16_u:49: 16,002.017c aghoṣayaṃś ca nagare vacanād āhukasya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:50: 16,002.017d*0008_01 janārdanasya rāmasya babhroś caiva mahātmanaḥ 16,002.018a adya prabhṛti sarveṣu vṛṣṇyandhakagṛheṣv iha 16,002.018c surāsavo na kartavyaḥ sarvair nagaravāsibhiḥ 16,002.019a yaś ca no 'viditaṃ kuryāt peyaṃ kaś cin naraḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_16_u:51: 16,002.019c jīvan sa śūlam ārohet svayaṃ kṛtvā sabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:52: 16,002.020a tato rājabhayāt sarve niyamaṃ cakrire tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:53: 16,002.020c narāḥ śāsanam ājñāya tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:54: 16,003.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 16,003.001a evaṃ prayatamānānāṃ vṛṣṇīnām andhakaiḥ saha 16,003.001c kālo gṛhāṇi sarveṣāṃ paricakrāma nityaśaḥ 16,003.002a karālo vikaṭo muṇḍaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalaḥ 16,003.002b*0009_01 karaṭo muṇḍaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:56: 16,003.002b*0010_02 kṛkalāsavāhanagaḥ kākapakṣavibhūṣaṇaḥ 16,003.002c gṛhāṇy avekṣya vṛṣṇīnāṃ nādṛśyata punaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_16_u:57: 16,003.002d*0011_01 tam aghnanta maheṣvāsāḥ śaraiḥ śatasahasraśaḥ 16,003.002d*0011_02 na cāśakyata veddhuṃ sa sarvabhūtātyayas tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:58: 16,003.003a utpedire mahāvātā dāruṇāś cā dine dine
GE07mbh_16_u:61: 16,003.004b*0012_01 keśā nakhāś ca suptānām adyante mūṣakair niśi
GE07mbh_16_u:63: 16,003.004e nopaśāmyati śabdaś ca sa divārātram eva hi
GE07mbh_16_u:64: 16,003.005a anukurvann ulūkānāṃ sārasā virutaṃ tathā 16,003.005c ajāḥ śivānāṃ ca rutam anvakurvata bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:65: 16,003.006a pāṇḍurā raktapādāś ca vihagāḥ kālacoditāḥ 16,003.006c vṛṣṇyandhakānāṃ geheṣu kapotā vyacaraṃs tadā 16,003.007a vyajāyanta kharā goṣu karabhāśvatarīṣu ca 16,003.007c śunīṣv api biḍālāś ca mūṣakā nakulīṣu ca
GE07mbh_16_u:66: 16,003.008a nāpatrapanta pāpāni kurvanto vṛṣṇayas tadā 16,003.008c prādviṣan brāhmaṇāṃś cāpi pitṝn devāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:67: 16,003.009a gurūṃś cāpy avamanyanta na tu rāmajanārdanau
GE07mbh_16_u:68: 16,003.009c patnyaḥ patīn vyuccaranta patnīś ca patayas tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:71: 16,003.011a udayāstamane nityaṃ puryāṃ tasyāṃ divākaraḥ 16,003.011c vyadṛśyatāsakṛt puṃbhiḥ kabandhaiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:74: 16,003.013a puṇyāhe vācyamāne ca japatsu ca mahātmasu
GE07mbh_16_u:75: 16,003.013b*0013_01 aśrūyanta śunāṃ śabdāḥ sarvataḥ karṇavedhakāḥ 16,003.013c abhidhāvantaḥ śrūyante na cādṛśyata kaś cana
GE07mbh_16_u:76: 16,003.014a parasparaṃ ca nakṣatraṃ hanyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:77: 16,003.014c grahair apaśyan sarve te nātmanas tu kathaṃ cana 16,003.015a nadantaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ ca vṛṣṇyandhakaniveśane
GE07mbh_16_u:79: 16,003.016a evaṃ paśyan hṛṣīkeśaḥ saṃprāptaṃ kālaparyayam 16,003.016c trayodaśyām amāvāsyāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā prābravīd idam
GE07mbh_16_u:80: 16,003.017a caturdaśī pañcadaśī kṛteyaṃ rāhuṇā punaḥ 16,003.017c tadā ca bhārate yuddhe prāptā cādya kṣayāya naḥ 16,003.018a vimṛśann eva kālaṃ taṃ paricintya janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:81: 16,003.018c mene prāptaṃ sa ṣaṭtriṃśaṃ varṣaṃ vai keśisūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:83: 16,003.019c yad anuvyājahārārtā tad idaṃ samupāgatam 16,003.020a idaṃ ca tad anuprāptam abravīd yad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:84: 16,003.020c purā vyūḍheṣv anīkeṣu dṛṣṭvotpātān sudāruṇān 16,003.020d*0014_01 puṇyadānapradāc cāpi śāntimohāc ca kevalāt 16,003.020d*0014_02 puṇyakarmaprayogāc ca nānyac chreyo bhaved iti
GE07mbh_16_u:85: 16,003.021a ity uktvā vāsudevas tu cikīrṣan satyam eva tat 16,003.021c ājñāpayām āsa tadā tīrthayātrām ariṃdama 16,003.022a aghoṣayanta puruṣās tatra keśavaśāsanāt
GE07mbh_16_u:86: 16,003.022c tīrthayātrā samudre vaḥ kāryeti puruṣarṣabhāḥ 16,004.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 16,004.001a kālī strī pāṇḍurair dantaiḥ praviśya hasatī niśi
GE07mbh_16_u:87: 16,004.001c striyaḥ svapneṣu muṣṇantī dvārakāṃ paridhāvati 16,004.001d*0015_01 agnihotraniketeṣu vāstumadhyeṣu veśmasu
GE07mbh_16_u:88: 16,004.001d*0015_02 vṛṣṇyandhakān akhādanta svapne gṛdhrā bhayānakāḥ 16,004.001d*0016_01 kurvanto bhīṣaṇān nādān karālāś cāpy asaṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:89: 16,004.001d*0016_02 tathā dviśiraso raudrāś caturbāhava eva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:90: 16,004.001d*0016_03 strīṇāṃ garbheṣu jāyante rākṣasā guhyakās tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:91: 16,004.002a alaṃkārāś ca chatraṃ ca dhvajāś ca kavacāni ca 16,004.002c hriyamāṇāny adṛśyanta rakṣobhiḥ subhayānakaiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:92: 16,004.003a tac cāgnidattaṃ kṛṣṇasya vajranābham ayasmayam 16,004.003c divam ācakrame cakraṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ paśyatāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:93: 16,004.004a yuktaṃ rathaṃ divyam ādityavarṇaṃ; hayāharan paśyato dārukasya
GE07mbh_16_u:94: 16,004.004c te sāgarasyopariṣṭhād avartan; manojavāś caturo vājimukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:95: 16,004.005a tālaḥ suparṇaś ca mahādhvajau tau; supūjitau rāmajanārdanābhyām 16,004.005c uccair jahrur apsaraso divāniśaṃ; vācaś cocur gamyatāṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:97: 16,004.005d*0017_01 bhagavaddarśanasparśasnehair vitatabhoginām 16,004.005d*0017_02 divaḥ praveśanārthaṃ te vimānair divam āyayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:99: 16,004.006c sāntaḥpurās tadā tīrthayātrām aicchan nararṣabhāḥ 16,004.007a tato bhojyaṃ ca bhakṣyaṃ ca peyaṃ cāndhakavṛṣṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:100: 16,004.007c bahu nānāvidhaṃ cakrur madyaṃ māṃsam anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:101: 16,004.008a tataḥ sīdhuṣu saktāś ca niryayur nagarād bahiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:102: 16,004.008c yānair aśvair gajaiś caiva śrīmantas tigmatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:103: 16,004.009a tataḥ prabhāse nyavasan yathoddeśaṃ yathāgṛham 16,004.009c prabhūtabhakṣyapeyās te sadārā yādavās tadā 16,004.010a niviṣṭāṃs tān niśamyātha samudrānte sa yogavit
GE07mbh_16_u:105: 16,004.011a taṃ prasthitaṃ mahātmānam abhivādya kṛtāñjalim 16,004.011c jānan vināśaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ naicchad vārayituṃ hariḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:107: 16,004.012c apaśyann uddhavaṃ yāntaṃ tejasāvṛtya rodasī 16,004.013a brāhmaṇārtheṣu yat siddham annaṃ teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_16_u:111: 16,004.015a kṛṣṇasya saṃnidhau rāmaḥ sahitaḥ kṛtavarmaṇā 16,004.015c apibad yuyudhānaś ca gado babhrus tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:112: 16,004.016a tataḥ pariṣado madhye yuyudhāno madotkaṭaḥ 16,004.016c abravīt kṛtavarmāṇam avahasyāvamanya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:113: 16,004.017a kaḥ kṣatriyo manyamānaḥ suptān hanyān mṛtān iva
GE07mbh_16_u:114: 16,004.017c na tan mṛṣyanti hārdikya yādavā yat tvayā kṛtam 16,004.017d*0018_01 na tan mṛṣyati hārdikyo yad avocat tadā ruṣā 16,004.018a ity ukte yuyudhānena pūjayām āsa tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:115: 16,004.018c pradyumno rathināṃ śreṣṭho hārdikyam avamanya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:116: 16,004.019a tataḥ paramasaṃkruddhaḥ kṛtavarmā tam abravīt 16,004.019c nirdiśann iva sāvajñaṃ tadā savyena pāṇinā
GE07mbh_16_u:117: 16,004.020a bhūriśravāś chinnabāhur yuddhe prāyagatas tvayā 16,004.020c vadhena sunṛśaṃsena kathaṃ vīreṇa pātitaḥ 16,004.021a iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā keśavaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_16_u:118: 16,004.021c tiryak saroṣayā dṛṣṭyā vīkṣāṃ cakre sa manyumān
GE07mbh_16_u:119: 16,004.022a maṇiḥ syamantakaś caiva yaḥ sa satrājito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_16_u:120: 16,004.022c tāṃ kathāṃ smārayām āsa sātyakir madhusūdanam
GE07mbh_16_u:121: 16,004.023a tac chrutvā keśavasyāṅkam agamad rudatī tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:123: 16,004.024a tata utthāya sakrodhaḥ sātyakir vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_16_u:125: 16,004.025a eṣa gacchāmi padavīṃ satyena ca tathā śape
GE07mbh_16_u:126: 16,004.025c sauptike ye ca nihatāḥ suptānena durātmanā
GE07mbh_16_u:128: 16,004.026c samāptam āyur asyādya yaśaś cāpi sumadhyame
GE07mbh_16_u:129: 16,004.027a itīdam uktvā khaḍgena keśavasya samīpataḥ 16,004.027c abhidrutya śiraḥ kruddhaś ciccheda kṛtavarmaṇaḥ 16,004.028a tathānyān api nighnantaṃ yuyudhānaṃ samantataḥ 16,004.028c abhyadhāvad dhṛṣīkeśo vinivārayiṣus tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:132: 16,004.030a tān dṛṣṭvā patatas tūrṇam abhikruddhāñ janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:133: 16,004.030c na cukrodha mahātejā jānan kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_16_u:134: 16,004.031a te tu pānamadāviṣṭāś coditāś caiva manyunā
GE07mbh_16_u:135: 16,004.031c yuyudhānam athābhyaghnann ucchiṣṭair bhājanais tadā 16,004.032a hanyamāne tu śaineye kruddho rukmiṇinandanaḥ 16,004.032c tadantaram upādhāvan mokṣayiṣyañ śineḥ sutam 16,004.033a sa bhojaiḥ saha saṃyuktaḥ sātyakiś cāndhakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_16_u:137: 16,004.033c bahutvān nihatau tatra ubhau kṛṣṇasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:138: 16,004.034a hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tu śaineyaṃ putraṃ ca yadunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:139: 16,004.034c erakāṇāṃ tadā muṣṭiṃ kopāj jagrāha keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:140: 16,004.035a tad abhūn musalaṃ ghoraṃ vajrakalpam ayomayam
GE07mbh_16_u:141: 16,004.035c jaghāna tena kṛṣṇas tān ye 'sya pramukhato 'bhavan
GE07mbh_16_u:142: 16,004.036a tato 'ndhakāś ca bhojāś ca śaineyā vṛṣṇayas tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:143: 16,004.036c jaghnur anyonyam ākrande musalaiḥ kālacoditāḥ 16,004.037a yas teṣām erakāṃ kaś cij jagrāha ruṣito nṛpa 16,004.037c vajrabhūteva sā rājann adṛśyata tadā vibho
GE07mbh_16_u:144: 16,004.038a tṛṇaṃ ca musalībhūtam api tatra vyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_16_u:145: 16,004.038c brahmadaṇḍakṛtaṃ sarvam iti tad viddhi pārthiva
GE07mbh_16_u:146: 16,004.039a āvidhyāvidhya te rājan prakṣipanti sma yat tṛṇam
GE07mbh_16_u:147: 16,004.039c tad vajrabhūtaṃ musalaṃ vyadṛśyata tadā dṛḍham
GE07mbh_16_u:148: 16,004.040a avadhīt pitaraṃ putraḥ pitā putraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:149: 16,004.040c mattāḥ paripatanti sma pothayantaḥ parasparam 16,004.041a pataṃgā iva cāgnau te nyapatan kukurāndhakāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:150: 16,004.041c nāsīt palāyane buddhir vadhyamānasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_16_u:151: 16,004.042a taṃ tu paśyan mahābāhur jānan kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_16_u:152: 16,004.042c musalaṃ samavaṣṭabhya tasthau sa madhusūdanaḥ 16,004.043a sāmbaṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā cārudeṣṇaṃ ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:153: 16,004.043c pradyumnaṃ cāniruddhaṃ ca tataś cukrodha bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:154: 16,004.044a gadaṃ vīkṣya śayānaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ kopasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:155: 16,004.044c sa niḥśeṣaṃ tadā cakre śārṅgacakragadādharaḥ 16,004.045a taṃ nighnantaṃ mahātejā babhruḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ 16,004.045c dārukaś caiva dāśārham ūcatur yan nibodha tat
GE07mbh_16_u:156: 16,004.046a bhagavan saṃhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā bhūyiṣṭham acyuta
GE07mbh_16_u:157: 16,004.046c rāmasya padam anviccha tatra gacchāma yatra saḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:158: 16,005.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 16,005.001a tato yayur dārukaḥ keśavaś ca; babhruś ca rāmasya padaṃ patantaḥ 16,005.001c athāpaśyan rāmam anantavīryaṃ; vṛkṣe sthitaṃ cintayānaṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:160: 16,005.002a tataḥ samāsādya mahānubhāvaḥ; kṛṣṇas tadā dārukam anvaśāsat
GE07mbh_16_u:161: 16,005.002c gatvā kurūñ śīghram imaṃ mahāntaṃ; pārthāya śaṃsasva vadhaṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:163: 16,005.003a tato 'rjunaḥ kṣipram ihopayātu; śrutvā mṛtān yādavān
GE07mbh_16_u:165: 16,005.003c ity evam uktaḥ sa yayau rathena; kurūṃs tadā dāruko naṣṭacetāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:166: 16,005.004a tato gate dāruke keśavo 'tha; dṛṣṭvāntike babhrum uvāca vākyam
GE07mbh_16_u:167: 16,005.004c striyo bhavān rakṣatu yātu śīghraṃ; naitā hiṃsyur dasyavo
GE07mbh_16_u:169: 16,005.005a sa prasthitaḥ keśavenānuśiṣṭo; madāturo jñātivadhārditaś ca
GE07mbh_16_u:170: 16,005.005c taṃ vai yāntaṃ saṃnidhau keśavasya; tvarantam ekaṃ sahasaiva
GE07mbh_16_u:172: 16,005.005e brahmānuśaptam avadhīn mahad vai; kūṭonmuktaṃ musalaṃ lubdhakasya
GE07mbh_16_u:173: 16,005.006a tato dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ babhrum āha; kṛṣṇo vākyaṃ bhrātaram
GE07mbh_16_u:174: agrajaṃ tu 16,005.006c ihaiva tvaṃ māṃ pratīkṣasva rāma; yāvat striyo jñātivaśāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:176: 16,005.007a tataḥ purīṃ dvāravatīṃ praviśya; janārdanaḥ pitaraṃ prāha
GE07mbh_16_u:178: 16,005.007c striyo bhavān rakṣatu naḥ samagrā; dhanaṃjayasyāgamanaṃ pratīkṣan 16,005.007e rāmo vanānte pratipālayan mām; āste 'dyāhaṃ tena samāgamiṣye 16,005.008a dṛṣṭaṃ mayedaṃ nidhanaṃ yadūnāṃ; rājñāṃ ca pūrvaṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:180: 16,005.008c nāhaṃ vinā yadubhir yādavānāṃ; purīm imāṃ draṣṭum ihādya śaktaḥ 16,005.009a tapaś cariṣyāmi nibodha tan me; rāmeṇa sārdhaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_16_u:182: 16,005.009c itīdam uktvā śirasāsya pādau; saṃspṛśya kṛṣṇas tvarito jagāma
GE07mbh_16_u:183: 16,005.010a tato mahān ninadaḥ prādurāsīt; sastrīkumārasya purasya tasya
GE07mbh_16_u:184: 16,005.010c athābravīt keśavaḥ saṃnivartya; śabdaṃ śrutvā yoṣitāṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:186: 16,005.011a purīm imām eṣyati savyasācī; sa vo duḥkhān mocayitā narāgryaḥ 16,005.011c tato gatvā keśavas taṃ dadarśa; rāmaṃ vane sthitam ekaṃ vivikte 16,005.012a athāpaśyad yogayuktasya tasya; nāgaṃ mukhān niḥsarantaṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:188: 16,005.012c śvetaṃ yayau sa tataḥ prekṣyamāṇo; mahārṇavo yena mahānubhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:191: 16,005.013a sahasraśīrṣaḥ parvatābhogavarṣmā; raktānanaḥ svāṃ tanuṃ tāṃ vimucya 16,005.013b*0022_01 saṃdṛśya taṃ sāgarāntaṃ viśantaṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:192: 16,005.013c samyak ca taṃ sāgaraḥ pratyagṛhṇān; nāgā divyāḥ saritaś caiva puṇyāḥ 16,005.014a karkoṭako vāsukis takṣakaś ca; pṛthuśravā varuṇaḥ kuñjaraś ca
GE07mbh_16_u:193: 16,005.014c miśrī śaṅkhaḥ kumudaḥ puṇḍarīkas; tathā nāgo dhṛtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_16_u:195: 16,005.015a hrādaḥ krāthaḥ śitikaṇṭho 'gratejās; tathā nāgau cakramandātiṣaṇḍau
GE07mbh_16_u:196: 16,005.015c nāgaśreṣṭho durmukhaś cāmbarīṣaḥ; svayaṃ rājā varuṇaś cāpi rājan 16,005.015e pratyudgamya svāgatenābhyanandaṃs; te 'pūjayaṃś
GE07mbh_16_u:201: 16,005.016a tato gate bhrātari vāsudevo; jānan sarvā gatayo divyadṛṣṭiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:202: 16,005.016c vane śūnye vicaraṃś cintayāno; bhūmau tataḥ saṃviveśāgryatejāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:203: 16,005.017a sarvaṃ hi tena prāk tadā vittam āsīd; gāndhāryā yad vākyam
GE07mbh_16_u:205: 16,005.017c durvāsasā pāyasocchiṣṭalipte; yac cāpy uktaṃ tac ca sasmāra
GE07mbh_16_u:212: 16,005.018c mene tataḥ saṃkramaṇasya kālaṃ; tataś cakārendriyasaṃnirodham 16,005.018d*0026_01 yathā ca lokasthitipālanārthaṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:216: 16,005.019a sa saṃniruddhendriyavāṅmanās tu; śiśye mahāyogam upetya kṛṣṇaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:217: 16,005.019c jarātha taṃ deśam upājagāma; lubdhas tadānīṃ mṛgalipsur ugraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:218: 16,005.020a sa keśavaṃ yogayuktaṃ śayānaṃ; mṛgāśaṅkī lubdhakaḥ sāyakena
GE07mbh_16_u:219: 16,005.020c jarāvidhyat pādatale tvarāvāṃs; taṃ cābhitas taj jighṛkṣur jagāma 16,005.020d*0027_01 kṛṣṇaṃ śayānaṃ sa vikṛṣya bāṇaṃ 16,005.020d*0027_02 vivyādha pāde mṛgaśaṅkayā jarā
GE07mbh_16_u:221: 16,005.021a matvātmānam aparāddhaṃ sa tasya; jagrāha pādau śirasā
GE07mbh_16_u:223: 16,005.021c āśvāsayat taṃ mahātmā tadānīṃ; gacchann ūrdhvaṃ rodasī vyāpya lakṣmyā 16,005.021c*0028_01 tathānutāpāt karmaṇo janmanaś ca
GE07mbh_16_u:226: 16,005.021c*0028_04 gaṇair munīnāṃ pūjitas tatra kṛṣṇaḥ 16,005.021d*0029_01 āśvāsayām āsa tataś ca kṛṣṇa 16,005.021d*0029_02 ūrdhvaṃ gacchan vyāpya lokān svalakṣmyā 16,005.021d*0030_01 taṃ yogayuktyā sahasā hi lakṣya 16,005.022a divaṃ prāptaṃ vāsavo 'thāśvinau ca; rudrādityā vasavaś cātha
GE07mbh_16_u:228: 16,005.022c pratyudyayur munayaś cāpi siddhā; gandharvamukhyāś ca sahāpsarobhiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:231: 16,005.023a tato rājan bhagavān ugratejā; nārāyaṇaḥ prabhavaś cāvyayaś ca
GE07mbh_16_u:232: 16,005.023c yogācāryo rodasī vyāpya lakṣmyā; sthānaṃ prāpa svaṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:234: 16,005.024a tato devair ṛṣibhiś cāpi kṛṣṇaḥ; samāgataś cāraṇaiś caiva
GE07mbh_16_u:237: 16,005.024b*0032_02 devaiḥ sarvair ṛṣibhiś cāraṇaiś ca 16,005.024c gandharvāgryair apsarobhir varābhiḥ; siddhaiḥ sādhyaiś cānataiḥ pūjyamānaḥ 16,005.025a te vai devāḥ pratyanandanta rājan; muniśreṣṭhā vāgbhir ānarcur
GE07mbh_16_u:240: 16,005.025b*0033_02 saṃstūyamānaḥ surasiddhasaṃghaiḥ 16,005.025c gandharvāś cāpy upatasthuḥ stuvantaḥ; prītyā cainaṃ puruhūto
GE07mbh_16_u:242: 16,005.025d@001_0001 namo namas te bhagavañ śārṅgadhanvan 16,005.025d@001_0002 dharmasthityā prādurāsīr dharāyām
GE07mbh_16_u:247: 16,005.025d@001_0007 gaccha prabho rakṣa cārtiṃ prapannān 16,005.025d@001_0008 kalpe kalpe jāyamāna svamūrtyā
GE07mbh_16_u:250: 16,005.025d@001_0011 vāṇī hy āsīt saṃśritā rūpiṇī sā
GE07mbh_16_u:251: 16,005.025d@001_0012 bhānor madhye praviśa tvaṃ tu rājan
GE07mbh_16_u:253: 16,005.025d@001_0014 rūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ divi saṃsthitaṃ ca 16,005.025d@001_0015 bhūmau gataṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:254: 16,005.025d@001_0016 sadā hi tasmin nivasāmi devāḥ 16,005.025d@001_0017 devā nivṛttās tat padaṃ nāpnuvanto 16,005.025d@001_0018 buddhyā devaṃ saṃsmarantaḥ pratītāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:256: 16,005.025d@001_0020 śubhāṃl lokān svān prapeduḥ surendrāḥ 16,006.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 16,006.001a dāruko 'pi kurūn gatvā dṛṣṭvā pārthān mahārathān 16,006.001c ācaṣṭa mausale vṛṣṇīn anyonyenopasaṃhṛtān
GE07mbh_16_u:259: 16,006.003a tato 'rjunas tān āmantrya keśavasya priyaḥ sakhā 16,006.003c prayayau mātulaṃ draṣṭuṃ nedam astīti cābravīt
GE07mbh_16_u:260: 16,006.004a sa vṛṣṇinilayaṃ gatvā dārukeṇa saha prabho
GE07mbh_16_u:261: 16,006.004c dadarśa dvārakāṃ vīro mṛtanāthām iva striyam
GE07mbh_16_u:262: 16,006.005a yāḥ sma tā lokanāthena nāthavatyaḥ purābhavan
GE07mbh_16_u:263: 16,006.005c tās tv anāthās tadā nāthaṃ pārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā vicukruśuḥ 16,006.005d*0034_01 arjunaṃ tāḥ sma nāthaṃ ca dṛṣṭvānāthaṃ vicukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:264: 16,006.006a ṣoḍaśastrīsahasrāṇi vāsudevaparigrahaḥ 16,006.006c tāsām āsīn mahān nādo dṛṣṭvaivārjunam
GE07mbh_16_u:265: 16,006.007a tās tu dṛṣṭvaiva kauravyo bāṣpeṇa pihito 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:266: 16,006.007c hīnāḥ kṛṣṇena putraiś ca nāśakat so 'bhivīkṣitum
GE07mbh_16_u:267: 16,006.008a tāṃ sa vṛṣṇyandhakajalāṃ hayamīnāṃ rathoḍupām 16,006.008c vāditrarathaghoṣaughāṃ veśmatīrthamahāgrahām 16,006.009a ratnaśaivalasaṃghāṭāṃ vajraprākāramālinīm 16,006.009c rathyāsrotojalāvartāṃ catvarastimitahradām 16,006.010a rāmakṛṣṇamahāgrāhāṃ dvārakāsaritaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:268: 16,006.010c kālapāśagrahāṃ ghorāṃ nadīṃ vaitaraṇīm iva 16,006.011a tāṃ dadarśārjuno dhīmān vihīnāṃ vṛṣṇipuṃgavaiḥ 16,006.011c gataśriyaṃ nirānandāṃ padminīṃ śiśire yathā 16,006.012a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dvārakāṃ pārthas tāś ca kṛṣṇasya yoṣitaḥ 16,006.012c sasvanaṃ bāṣpam utsṛjya nipapāta mahītale 16,006.013a sātrājitī tataḥ satyā rukmiṇī ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_16_u:270: 16,006.014a tatas tāḥ kāñcane pīṭhe samutthāyopaveśya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:272: 16,006.015a tataḥ saṃstūya govindaṃ kathayitvā ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:273: 16,006.015c āśvāsya tāḥ striyaś cāpi mātulaṃ draṣṭum abhyagāt
GE07mbh_16_u:274: 16,007.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 16,007.001a taṃ śayānaṃ mahātmānaṃ vīram ānakadundubhim 16,007.001c putraśokābhisaṃtaptaṃ dadarśa kurupuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:276: 16,007.002c ārtasyārtataraḥ pārthaḥ pādau jagrāha bhārata 16,007.002d*0035_01 tasya mūrdhānam āghrātum iyeṣānakadundubhiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:277: 16,007.002d*0035_02 svasrīyasya mahābāhur na śaśāka ca śatruhan
GE07mbh_16_u:278: 16,007.003a samāliṅgyārjunaṃ vṛddhaḥ sa bhujābhyāṃ mahābhujaḥ 16,007.003c rudan putrān smaran sarvān vilalāpa suvihvalaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:279: 16,007.003e bhrātṝn putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca dauhitrāṃś ca sakhīn api
GE07mbh_16_u:280: 16,007.004 vasudeva uvāca 16,007.004a yair jitā bhūmipālāś ca daityāś ca śataśo 'rjuna
GE07mbh_16_u:281: 16,007.004c tān dṛṣṭvā neha paśyāmi jīvāmy arjuna durmaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:282: 16,007.005a yau tāv arjuna śiṣyau te priyau bahumatau sadā 16,007.005c tayor apanayāt pārtha vṛṣṇayo nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:283: 16,007.006a yau tau vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ dvāv evātirathau matau
GE07mbh_16_u:284: 16,007.006c pradyumno yuyudhānaś ca kathayan katthase ca yau
GE07mbh_16_u:285: 16,007.007a nityaṃ tvaṃ kuruśārdūla kṛṣṇaś ca mama putrakaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:286: 16,007.007c tāv ubhau vṛṣṇināśasya mukham āstāṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_16_u:287: 16,007.008a na tu garhāmi śaineyaṃ hārdikyaṃ cāham arjuna
GE07mbh_16_u:288: 16,007.008c akrūraṃ raukmiṇeyaṃ ca śāpo hy evātra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_16_u:289: 16,007.009a keśinaṃ yas tu kaṃsaṃ ca vikramya jagataḥ prabhuḥ 16,007.009c videhāv akarot pārtha caidyaṃ ca balagarvitam
GE07mbh_16_u:290: 16,007.010a naiṣādim ekalavyaṃ ca cakre kāliṅgamāgadhān 16,007.010c gāndhārān kāśirājaṃ ca marubhūmau ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_16_u:291: 16,007.011a prācyāṃś ca dākṣiṇātyāṃś ca pārvatīyāṃs tathā nṛpān
GE07mbh_16_u:293: 16,007.011d*0036_01 tvaṃ hi taṃ nāradaś caiva munayaś ca sanātanam 16,007.011d*0036_02 govindaṃ paramaṃ devam abhijānīdhvam acyutam 16,007.011d*0036_03 pratyapaśyac ca sa vibhur jñātikṣayam adhokṣajaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:294: 16,007.011d*0036_04 upaprekṣitavān nityaṃ svayaṃ sa mama putrakaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:295: 16,007.011d*0036_05 gāndhāryā vacanaṃ yat tad ṛṣīṇāṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_16_u:296: 16,007.011d*0036_06 tan nūnam anyathā kartuṃ naicchat sa jagataḥ prabhuḥ 16,007.011d*0036_07 pratyakṣaṃ bhavataś cāpi tava pautraḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_16_u:297: 16,007.011d*0036_08 aśvatthāmnā hataś cāpi jīvitas tasya tejasā
GE07mbh_16_u:298: 16,007.011d*0036_09 imāṃs tu naicchat svāñ jñātīn rakṣituṃ sa sakhā tava
GE07mbh_16_u:299: 16,007.012a tataḥ putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca bhrātṝn atha sakhīn api
GE07mbh_16_u:300: 16,007.012c śayānān nihatān dṛṣṭvā tato mām abravīd idam
GE07mbh_16_u:302: 16,007.013c āgamiṣyati bībhatsur imāṃ dvāravatīṃ purīm 16,007.014a ākhyeyaṃ tasya yad vṛttaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ vaiśasaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_16_u:303: 16,007.014c sa tu śrutvā mahātejā yadūnām anayaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_16_u:304: 16,007.014e āgantā kṣipram eveha na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_16_u:305: 16,007.015a yo 'haṃ tam arjunaṃ viddhi yo 'rjunaḥ so 'ham eva tu 16,007.015b*0037_01 yathā jīvaṃ paraṃ brahma mahāvākyasya niścayāt
GE07mbh_16_u:306: 16,007.015c yad brūyāt tat tathā kāryam iti budhyasva mādhava 16,007.016a sa strīṣu prāptakālaṃ vaḥ pāṇḍavo bālakeṣu ca
GE07mbh_16_u:308: 16,007.017a imāṃ ca nagarīṃ sadyaḥ pratiyāte dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_16_u:310: 16,007.018a ahaṃ hi deśe kasmiṃś cit puṇye niyamam āsthitaḥ 16,007.018c kālaṃ kartā sadya eva rāmeṇa saha dhīmatā
GE07mbh_16_u:311: 16,007.019a evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśo mām acintyaparākramaḥ 16,007.019c hitvā māṃ bālakaiḥ sārdhaṃ diśaṃ kām apy agāt prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:312: 16,007.020a so 'haṃ tau ca mahātmānau cintayan bhrātarau tava
GE07mbh_16_u:313: 16,007.020c ghoraṃ jñātivadhaṃ caiva na bhuñje śokakarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:314: 16,007.021a na ca bhokṣye na jīviṣye diṣṭyā prāpto 'si pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_16_u:315: 16,007.021c yad uktaṃ pārtha kṛṣṇena tat sarvam akhilaṃ kuru 16,007.022a etat te pārtha rājyaṃ ca striyo ratnāni caiva ha
GE07mbh_16_u:316: 16,007.022b*0038_01 prāpya vṛṣṇipravīreṇa yadubhiś caiva pālitaḥ 16,007.022b*0038_02 tair hīnāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭuṃ na ca śakṣyāmi phalguna 16,007.022c iṣṭān prāṇān ahaṃ hīmāṃs tyakṣyāmi ripusūdana
GE07mbh_16_u:317: 16,008.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 16,008.001a evam uktaḥ sa bībhatsur mātulena paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:318: 16,008.001c durmanā dīnamanasaṃ vasudevam uvāca ha 16,008.002a nāhaṃ vṛṣṇipravīreṇa madhubhiś caiva mātula 16,008.002c vihīnāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭuṃ śaktaś ciram iha prabho
GE07mbh_16_u:319: 16,008.003a rājā ca bhīmasenaś ca sahadevaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:320: 16,008.003c nakulo yājñasenī ca ṣaḍ ekamanaso vayam
GE07mbh_16_u:321: 16,008.004a rājñaḥ saṃkramaṇe cāpi kālo 'yaṃ vartate dhruvam 16,008.004c tam imaṃ viddhi saṃprāptaṃ kālaṃ kālavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_16_u:322: 16,008.005a sarvathā vṛṣṇidārāṃs tu bālavṛddhāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:324: 16,008.006a ity uktvā dārukam idaṃ vākyam āha dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:325: 16,008.006c amātyān vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi māciram 16,008.007a ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ sudharmāṃ yādavīṃ sabhām
GE07mbh_16_u:327: 16,008.008a tam āsanagataṃ tatra sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:329: 16,008.009a tān dīnamanasaḥ sarvān nibhṛtān gatacetasaḥ 16,008.009c uvācedaṃ vacaḥ pārthaḥ svayaṃ dīnataras tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:330: 16,008.010a śakraprastham ahaṃ neṣye vṛṣṇyandhakajanaṃ svayam 16,008.010c idaṃ tu nagaraṃ sarvaṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati
GE07mbh_16_u:331: 16,008.011a sajjīkuruta yānāni ratnāni vividhāni ca 16,008.011c vajro 'yaṃ bhavatāṃ rājā śakraprasthe bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_16_u:332: 16,008.012a saptame divase caiva ravau vimala udgate
GE07mbh_16_u:333: 16,008.012c bahir vatsyāmahe sarve sajjībhavata māciram 16,008.013a ity uktās tena te paurāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:334: 16,008.013c sajjam āśu tataś cakruḥ svasiddhyarthaṃ samutsukāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:335: 16,008.014a tāṃ rātrim avasat pārthaḥ keśavasya niveśane
GE07mbh_16_u:338: 16,008.015c yuktvātmānaṃ mahātejā jagāma gatim uttamām 16,008.016a tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīd vasudevasya veśmani
GE07mbh_16_u:339: 16,008.016c dāruṇaḥ krośatīnāṃ ca rudatīnāṃ ca yoṣitām
GE07mbh_16_u:341: 16,008.017c urāṃsi pāṇibhir ghnantyo vyalapan karuṇaṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:342: 16,008.018a taṃ devakī ca bhadrā ca rohiṇī madirā tathā 16,008.018c anvāroḍhuṃ vyavasitā bhartāraṃ yoṣitāṃ varāḥ 16,008.019a tataḥ śauriṃ nṛyuktena bahumālyena bhārata 16,008.019c yānena mahatā pārtho bahir niṣkrāmayat tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:343: 16,008.020a tam anvayus tatra tatra duḥkhaśokasamāhatāḥ 16,008.020c dvārakāvāsinaḥ paurāḥ sarva eva nararṣabha 16,008.021a tasyāśvamedhikaṃ chatraṃ dīpyamānāś ca pāvakāḥ 16,008.021c purastāt tasya yānasya yājakāś ca tato yayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:344: 16,008.022a anujagmuś ca taṃ vīraṃ devyas tā vai svalaṃkṛtāḥ 16,008.022c strīsahasraiḥ parivṛtā vadhūbhiś ca sahasraśaḥ 16,008.023a yas tu deśaḥ priyas tasya jīvato 'bhūn mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:346: 16,008.024a taṃ citāgnigataṃ vīraṃ śūraputraṃ varāṅganāḥ 16,008.024c tato 'nvāruruhuḥ patnyaś catasraḥ patilokagāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:347: 16,008.025a taṃ vai catasṛbhiḥ strībhir anvitaṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:348: 16,008.025c adāhayac candanaiś ca gandhair uccāvacair api
GE07mbh_16_u:349: 16,008.026a tataḥ prādurabhūc chabdaḥ samiddhasya vibhāvasoḥ 16,008.026c sāmagānāṃ ca nirghoṣo narāṇāṃ rudatām api
GE07mbh_16_u:351: 16,008.027c sarva evodakaṃ cakruḥ striyaś caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:352: 16,008.028a aluptadharmas taṃ dharmaṃ kārayitvā sa phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:353: 16,008.028c jagāma vṛṣṇayo yatra vinaṣṭā bharatarṣabha 16,008.029a sa tān dṛṣṭvā nipatitān kadane bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:354: 16,008.029c babhūvātīva kauravyaḥ prāptakālaṃ cakāra ca 16,008.030a yathāpradhānataś caiva cakre sarvāḥ kriyās tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:355: 16,008.030c ye hatā brahmaśāpena musalair erakodbhavaiḥ 16,008.030d*0039_01 tato bhagavato dehaṃ dṛṣṭvā śiṣyaḥ pralapya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:356: 16,008.030d*0039_02 smṛtvā tad vacanaṃ sarvaṃ mohaśokopabṛṃhitam 16,008.031a tataḥ śarīre rāmasya vāsudevasya cobhayoḥ 16,008.031c anviṣya dāhayām āsa puruṣair āptakāribhiḥ 16,008.031d*0040_01 aṣṭau mahiṣyaḥ kṛṣṇasya rukmiṇīpramukhā nṛpa 16,008.031d*0040_02 revatī ca mahābhāgā viviśur jātavedasam 16,008.031d*0040_03 tayoḥ śarīre saṃśliṣya tatsaṅgāhlādaśītaḷe
GE07mbh_16_u:357: 16,008.032a sa teṣāṃ vidhivat kṛtvā pretakāryāṇi pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:358: 16,008.032c saptame divase prāyād ratham āruhya satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:359: 16,008.032e aśvayuktai rathaiś cāpi gokharoṣṭrayutair api 16,008.033a striyas tā vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ rudatyaḥ śokakarśitāḥ 16,008.033c anujagmur mahātmānaṃ pāṇḍuputraṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_16_u:360: 16,008.034a bhṛtyās tv andhakavṛṣṇīnāṃ sādino rathinaś ca ye
GE07mbh_16_u:362: 16,008.034e yayus te parivāryātha kalatraṃ pārthaśāsanāt 16,008.035a kuñjaraiś ca gajārohā yayuḥ śailanibhais tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:364: 16,008.036a putrāś cāndhakavṛṣṇīnāṃ sarve pārtham anuvratāḥ 16,008.036c brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś caiva mahādhanāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:365: 16,008.037a daśa ṣaṭ ca sahasrāṇi vāsudevāvarodhanam 16,008.037c puraskṛtya yayur vajraṃ pautraṃ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:366: 16,008.038a bahūni ca sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca
GE07mbh_16_u:369: 16,008.039c uvāha rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pārthaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ 16,008.040a niryāte tu jane tasmin sāgaro makarālayaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:371: 16,008.040d*0041_01 yad yad dhi puruṣavyāghro bhūmes tasyā vyamuñcata
GE07mbh_16_u:372: 16,008.040d*0041_02 tat tat saṃplāvayām āsa salilena sa sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:373: 16,008.040d*0042_01 abravīc ca tadā sarvān prāṇinas tatra sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:374: 16,008.040d*0042_02 tyaktvā suvarṇanicayān ratnāni vividhāni ca 16,008.040d*0042_03 bhājanāni ca haimāni raupyāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_16_u:376: 16,008.040d*0042_05 saveśmakā purī ceyaṃ hareḥ pālyā mayādhunā
GE07mbh_16_u:377: 16,008.040d*0042_06 punar yatrāvatāraś ca bhaviṣyati kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_16_u:378: 16,008.040d*0042_07 kośādhyakṣo 'smy ahaṃ tasya tasyaitāny api no dhanam
GE07mbh_16_u:379: 16,008.041a tad adbhutam abhiprekṣya dvārakāvāsino janāḥ 16,008.041c tūrṇāt tūrṇataraṃ jagmur aho daivam iti bruvan
GE07mbh_16_u:380: 16,008.042a kānaneṣu ca ramyeṣu parvateṣu nadīṣu ca
GE07mbh_16_u:381: 16,008.042c nivasann ānayām āsa vṛṣṇidārān dhanaṃjayaḥ 16,008.043a sa pañcanadam āsādya dhīmān atisamṛddhimat 16,008.043c deśe gopaśudhānyāḍhye nivāsam akarot prabhuḥ 16,008.044a tato lobhaḥ samabhavad dasyūnāṃ nihateśvarāḥ 16,008.044c dṛṣṭvā striyo nīyamānāḥ pārthenaikena bhārata 16,008.045a tatas te pāpakarmāṇo lobhopahatacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:386: 16,008.046c nayaty asmān atikramya yodhāś ceme hataujasaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:388: 16,008.046d*0044_02 jitvā śakraṃ ca rudraṃ ca so 'smān adyāvamanyate
GE07mbh_16_u:389: 16,008.047a tato yaṣṭipraharaṇā dasyavas te sahasraśaḥ 16,008.047c abhyadhāvanta vṛṣṇīnāṃ taṃ janaṃ loptrahāriṇaḥ 16,008.048a mahatā siṃhanādena drāvayantaḥ pṛthagjanam
GE07mbh_16_u:391: 16,008.049a tato nivṛttaḥ kaunteyaḥ sahasā sapadānugaḥ 16,008.049c uvāca tān mahābāhur arjunaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_16_u:392: 16,008.050a nivartadhvam adharmajñā yadi stha na mumūrṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:393: 16,008.050c nedānīṃ śaranirbhinnāḥ śocadhvaṃ nihatā mayā 16,008.051a tathoktās tena vīreṇa kadarthīkṛtya tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:394: 16,008.051c abhipetur janaṃ mūḍhā vāryamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:395: 16,008.052a tato 'rjuno dhanur divyaṃ gāṇḍīvam ajaraṃ mahat 16,008.052b*0045_01 ākroṣṭuṃ nāśakaj jiṣṇuḥ sarvaprāṇaiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:396: 16,008.052c āropayitum ārebhe yatnād iva kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_16_u:397: 16,008.053a cakāra sajyaṃ kṛcchreṇa saṃbhrame tumule sati
GE07mbh_16_u:399: 16,008.053a*0046_02 tvagbhedaṃ na śarāś cakrur astā gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_16_u:400: 16,008.053c cintayām āsa cāstrāṇi na ca sasmāra tāny api 16,008.054a vaikṛtyaṃ tan mahad dṛṣṭvā bhujavīrye tathā yudhi
GE07mbh_16_u:402: 16,008.055a vṛṣṇiyodhāś ca te sarve gajāśvarathayāyinaḥ 16,008.055c na śekur āvartayituṃ hriyamāṇaṃ ca taṃ janam
GE07mbh_16_u:403: 16,008.056a kalatrasya bahutvāt tu saṃpatatsu tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:404: 16,008.056c prayatnam akarot pārtho janasya parirakṣaṇe 16,008.057a miṣatāṃ sarvayodhānāṃ tatas tāḥ pramadottamāḥ 16,008.057c samantato 'vakṛṣyanta kāmāc cānyāḥ pravavrajuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:405: 16,008.058a tato gāṇḍīvanirmuktaiḥ śaraiḥ pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ 16,008.058c jaghāna dasyūn sodvego vṛṣṇibhṛtyaiḥ saha prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:406: 16,008.059a kṣaṇena tasya te rājan kṣayaṃ jagmur ajihmagāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:407: 16,008.059c akṣayā hi purā bhūtvā kṣīṇāḥ kṣatajabhojanāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:409: 16,008.060c dhanuṣkoṭyā tadā dasyūn avadhīt pākaśāsaniḥ 16,008.061a prekṣatas tv eva pārthasya vṛṣṇyandhakavarastriyaḥ 16,008.061c jagmur ādāya te mlecchāḥ samantāj janamejaya
GE07mbh_16_u:410: 16,008.062a dhanaṃjayas tu daivaṃ tan manasācintayat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:412: 16,008.063a astrāṇāṃ ca praṇāśena bāhuvīryasya saṃkṣayāt 16,008.063c dhanuṣaś cāvidheyatvāc charāṇāṃ saṃkṣayeṇa ca 16,008.064a babhūva vimanāḥ pārtho daivam ity anucintayan
GE07mbh_16_u:413: 16,008.064c nyavartata tato rājan nedam astīti cābravīt
GE07mbh_16_u:414: 16,008.065a tataḥ sa śeṣam ādāya kalatrasya mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:416: 16,008.066a evaṃ kalatram ānīya vṛṣṇīnāṃ hṛtaśeṣitam 16,008.066b*0047_01 yudhiṣṭhirasyānumate vaṃśakartṛkumārakān 16,008.066c nyaveśayata kauravyas tatra tatra dhanaṃjayaḥ 16,008.067a hārdikyatanayaṃ pārtho nagaraṃ mārtikāvatam
GE07mbh_16_u:419: 16,008.068a tato vṛddhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca striyaś cādāya pāṇḍavaḥ 16,008.068c vīrair vihīnān sarvāṃs tāñ śakraprasthe nyaveśayat
GE07mbh_16_u:420: 16,008.069a yauyudhāniṃ sarasvatyāṃ putraṃ sātyakinaḥ priyam 16,008.069c nyaveśayata dharmātmā
GE07mbh_16_u:421: 16,008.070a indraprasthe dadau rājyaṃ vajrāya paravīrahā 16,008.070c vajreṇākrūradārās tu vāryamāṇāḥ pravavrajuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:423: 16,008.071a rukmiṇī tv atha gāndhārī śaibyā haimavatīty api
GE07mbh_16_u:424: 16,008.071c devī jāmbavatī caiva viviśur jātavedasam 16,008.072a satyabhāmā tathaivānyā devyaḥ kṛṣṇasya saṃmatāḥ 16,008.072c vanaṃ praviviśū rājaṃs tāpasye kṛtaniścayāḥ 16,008.072d*0050_01 phalamūlādibhojinyo haridhyānaikatatparāḥ 16,008.072d*0050_02 himavantam atikramya kalāpagrāmam āviśan
GE07mbh_16_u:425: 16,008.073a dvārakāvāsino ye tu puruṣāḥ pārtham anvayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:426: 16,008.073c yathārhaṃ saṃvibhajyainān vajre paryadadaj jayaḥ 16,008.074a sa tat kṛtvā prāptakālaṃ bāṣpeṇāpihito 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:428: 16,009.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 16,009.001a praviśann arjuno rājann āśramaṃ satyavādinaḥ 16,009.001c dadarśāsīnam ekānte muniṃ satyavatīsutam
GE07mbh_16_u:429: 16,009.002a sa tam āsādya dharmajñam upatasthe mahāvratam
GE07mbh_16_u:431: 16,009.003a svāgataṃ te 'stv iti prāha muniḥ satyavatīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:432: 16,009.003c āsyatām iti covāca prasannātmā mahāmuniḥ 16,009.004a tam apratītamanasaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ 16,009.004c nirviṇṇamanasaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārthaṃ vyāso 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_16_u:434: 16,009.004d*0052_01 paricārakeṣu yaḥ kaś cit tiṣṭhann eva vinidritaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:436: 16,009.004d*0052_03 sarvopaniṣadām arthaṃ yo brūte sa mahāguruḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:437: 16,009.004d*0052_04 tena saṃpūjitaṃ liṅgam uddiśya prativāsaram 16,009.004d*0052_05 niṣkadāne namaskāre niyame kena vighnitaḥ 16,009.004d*0052_06 ahany ahani vedāntaśravaṇaṃ ghaṭikādvayam
GE07mbh_16_u:438: 16,009.005a avīrajo 'bhighātas te brāhmaṇo vā hatas tvayā 16,009.005c yuddhe parājito vāsi gataśrīr iva lakṣyase
GE07mbh_16_u:439: 16,009.006a na tvā pratyabhijānāmi kim idaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_16_u:440: 16,009.006c śrotavyaṃ cen mayā pārtha kṣipram ākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_16_u:442: 16,009.006d*0053_01 tataḥ pārtho viniḥśvasya śrūyatāṃ bhagavan iti
GE07mbh_16_u:444: 16,009.007 arjuna uvāca 16,009.007a yaḥ sa medhavapuḥ śrīmān bṛhatpaṅkajalocanaḥ 16,009.007c sa kṛṣṇaḥ saha rāmeṇa tyaktvā dehaṃ divaṃ gataḥ 16,009.007d*0054_01 tad anusmṛtya saṃmohaṃ sadā śokaṃ mahāmate
GE07mbh_16_u:445: 16,009.007d*0054_02 prayāmi sarvadā mahyaṃ mumūrṣā copajāyate 16,009.007d*0054_03 tvadvākyasparśanālokasukhaṃ cāmṛtasaṃnibham 16,009.007d*0054_04 saṃsmṛtya devadevasya pramuhyāmi mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:447: 16,009.007d*0055_02 yatprabhāveṇa nirdagdhāḥ sa kṛṣṇas tyaktavān bhuvam
GE07mbh_16_u:450: 16,009.009a ye te śūrā mahātmānaḥ siṃhadarpā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:451: 16,009.009c bhojavṛṣṇyandhakā brahmann anyonyaṃ tair hataṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_16_u:453: 16,009.010c ta erakābhir nihatāḥ paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_16_u:454: 16,009.011a hataṃ pañcaśataṃ teṣāṃ sahasraṃ bāhuśālinām 16,009.011c nidhanaṃ samanuprāptaṃ
GE07mbh_16_u:455: 16,009.012a punaḥ punar na mṛśyāmi vināśam amitaujasām
GE07mbh_16_u:456: 16,009.012c cintayāno yadūnāṃ ca kṛṣṇasya ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:458: 16,009.013c nabhasaḥ patanaṃ caiva śaityam agnes tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:459: 16,009.014a aśraddheyam ahaṃ manye vināśaṃ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ 16,009.014c na ceha sthātum icchāmi loke kṛṣṇavinākṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:460: 16,009.015a itaḥ kaṣṭataraṃ cānyac chṛṇu tad vai tapodhana
GE07mbh_16_u:461: 16,009.015c mano me dīryate yena cintayānasya vai muhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:462: 16,009.016a paśyato vṛṣṇidārāś ca mama brahman sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:464: 16,009.017a dhanur ādāya tatrāhaṃ nāśakaṃ tasya pūraṇe
GE07mbh_16_u:465: 16,009.017c yathā purā ca me vīryaṃ bhujayor na tathābhavat 16,009.018a astrāṇi me pranaṣṭāni vividhāni mahāmune 16,009.018c śarāś ca kṣayam āpannāḥ kṣaṇenaiva samantataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:466: 16,009.018d*0056_01 tad dhanus tāni cāstrāṇi sa rathas te ca vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:467: 16,009.018d*0056_02 sarvam ekapade bhraṣṭaṃ dānam aśrotriye yathā
GE07mbh_16_u:470: 16,009.020a yaḥ sa yāti purastān me rathasya sumahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:471: 16,009.020c pradahan ripusainyāni na paśyāmy aham adya tam
GE07mbh_16_u:472: 16,009.021a yena pūrvaṃ pradagdhāni śatrusainyāni tejasā 16,009.021c śarair gāṇḍīvanirmuktair ahaṃ paścād vyanāśayam 16,009.022a tam apaśyan viṣīdāmi ghūrṇāmīva ca sattama
GE07mbh_16_u:474: 16,009.022d*0057_01 devakīnandanaṃ devaṃ vāsudevam ajaṃ prabhum 16,009.023a vinā janārdanaṃ vīraṃ nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE07mbh_16_u:475: 16,009.023c śrutvaiva hi gataṃ viṣṇuṃ mamāpi mumuhur diśaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:477: 16,009.024c upadeṣṭuṃ mama śreyo bhavān arhati sattama
GE07mbh_16_u:478: 16,009.025 vyāsa uvāca 16,009.025*0058_01 devāṃśā devadevena saṃbhūtās te gatāḥ saha
GE07mbh_16_u:480: 16,009.025a brahmaśāpavinirdagdhā vṛṣṇyandhakamahārathāḥ 16,009.025c vinaṣṭāḥ kuruśārdūla na tāñ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_16_u:481: 16,009.026a bhavitavyaṃ tathā tad dhi diṣṭam etan mahātmanām
GE07mbh_16_u:482: 16,009.026c upekṣitaṃ ca kṛṣṇena śaktenāpi vyapohitum 16,009.027a trailokyam api kṛṣṇo hi kṛtsnaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_16_u:483: 16,009.027c prasahed anyathā kartuṃ kim u śāpaṃ manīṣiṇām
GE07mbh_16_u:484: 16,009.027d*0059_01 striyaś ca tāḥ purā śaptāḥ prahāsakupitena vai
GE07mbh_16_u:486: 16,009.028a rathasya purato yāti yaḥ sa cakragadādharaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:487: 16,009.028c tava snehāt purāṇarṣir vāsudevaś caturbhujaḥ 16,009.029a kṛtvā bhārāvataraṇaṃ pṛthivyāḥ pṛthulocanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:488: 16,009.029c mokṣayitvā jagat sarvaṃ gataḥ svasthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_16_u:489: 16,009.030a tvayā tv iha mahat karma devānāṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_16_u:490: 16,009.030c kṛtaṃ bhīmasahāyena yamābhyāṃ ca mahābhuja 16,009.031a kṛtakṛtyāṃś ca vo manye saṃsiddhān kurupuṃgava
GE07mbh_16_u:491: 16,009.031c gamanaṃ prāptakālaṃ ca tad dhi śreyo mataṃ mama 16,009.032a balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca pratipattiś ca bhārata 16,009.032c bhavanti bhavakāleṣu vipadyante viparyaye
GE07mbh_16_u:492: 16,009.032d*0060_01 tvayaikena hatāḥ pūrvaṃ bhīṣmakarṇādayo nṛpāḥ 16,009.032d*0060_02 te mām arjuna kālotthakarmaṇābhibhavo na saḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:493: 16,009.032d*0060_03 tvayā yat kauravā dhvastā yadābhīrair bhavāñ jitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:494: 16,009.033a kālamūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagadbījaṃ dhanaṃjaya 16,009.033c kāla eva samādatte punar eva yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_16_u:495: 16,009.034a sa eva balavān bhūtvā punar bhavati durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:496: 16,009.034c sa eveśaś ca bhūtveha parair ājñāpyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:497: 16,009.035a kṛtakṛtyāni cāstrāṇi gatāny adya yathāgatam 16,009.035c punar eṣyanti te hastaṃ yadā kālo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_16_u:498: 16,009.036a kālo gantuṃ gatiṃ mukhyāṃ bhavatām api bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:499: 16,009.036c etac chreyo hi vo manye paramaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_16_u:501: 16,009.037c anujñāto yayau pārtho nagaraṃ nāgasāhvayam 16,009.038a praviśya ca purīṃ vīraḥ samāsādya yudhiṣṭhiram
